newsitem.title: SPAIN: Eksportfinans issues 15-year 7 bln peseta matador.
newsitem.headline: Eksportfinans issues 15-year 7 bln peseta matador.

text.p: Eksportfinans is issuing a 15-year seven billion pesetas Matador with an issue price at par, said the lead manager Deutsche Morgan Grenfell in Madrid.
The issue expires on December 5 2011 and is callable at the end of the fifth year at 113.65 percent and at the end of the tenth year at 137.0 percent. The amortisation rate is 173.2 percent.
Volume is seven billion pesetas which can be raised to 10 billion. The coupon is 5.25 percent.
The Moody's rating on the issue is AA1.
